info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 11:45AM EST until December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Falls Village. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Thu 11 am: 7.7 Forecast: Thu 1 pm 7.6 Thu 7 pm 7.3 Fri 1 am 7.0 Fri 7 am 6.7 Fri 1 pm 6.4 Fri 7 pm 6.2 Sat 1 am 6.0 Sat 7 am 5.8 Sat 1 pm 5.6 Sat 7 pm 5.5 Sun 1 am 5.3 Sun 7 am 5.2 &&
